docs.text: Duck Roast Ingredients 1 KG duck meat, cleaned and cut 6 cloves 1 cinnamon, a finger long 10 cardamom 1 tsp black pepper 5 large onions 10 seedless dried pepper 1 ginger 2 tsp salt 2 tbsp coconut oil Instructions Mix all the ingredients together and let it rest for half an hour. Pressure-cook for 10 to 12 minutes with half a cup of water. Enjoy with white bread.
